original_title: Mike the Knight: Be a Knight!
overview: Mike always strives to be the best knight-in-training he can be, especially when the opportunity arises to win three trophies in one day and lead the big parade! With a little support of his friends, Mike learns to play fair and keep promises! Includes six episodes: The Triple Trophy Triumph, The New Castle, The Big Parade, The Knightly Welcome, The Wild Boar, and The Great Rescue.
title: Mike the Knight: Be a Knight!
